reviews.review: I've been playing this game for 10 years (on the Xbox 360) and I have never gotten sick of it. It's a great game to play with friends. It's fun to mess around, play campaigns, survival, and versus, sometimes with cheats too. The ambiance is what sets it apart from Left 4 Dead 2. This will always be my favorite game.

El padre del mejor juego shooter cooperativo. Incluso tiene coop versus.

9/10, 10/10 es para Left 4 Dead 2
This game is a very good game.

I love Left4Dead 2 more then Left4Dead. Left4Dead is still an awesome video game. But Modding sometimes confusing, annoying, makes me angry on it. But when the mods work. It's a fun time. I would recommend getting Left4Dead 1 on discount price, not full-price.

Juegazo, es mi juego favorito, llevo horas jugando y no me e aburrido, lo malo es que solo jugan entre 300 y 600 personas al dia y hace que en el online no este muy lleno de personas estando solo de 2 a 3 salas en supervivencia o campa√±a  y en enfrentamiento de 0 a 1 con suerte puede llegar a 3 salas.
It's from EA. Don't buy EA products.

I played the crap out of this game on Xbox 360 originally.  And that only had 5 levels...
Got the full 1000/1000 original gamerscore.  Pretty sure the last achievement was to literally not have anyone get hit by any special infected at any point for an entire campaign and I remember going to onto a forum and partying up with good players specifically with the intention of completing this achievement.  I also used to do speed runs of Blood Harvest on Expert Solo.  And there was a summer I spent every morning doing Blood Harvest with Brent and Frankie.  Good times.  Now everyone hates Left 4 Dead, so I hate them.
Fan√°tico de los zombis matar zombies por cientos .

One of the best multiplayer shooters of all time, also one of the best Zombie games of all time.

*Goes for L4D2 as well.
Get some friends together and shoot some zombies; this classic is just as fun today as at release.

Awesome fucking game, the best zombie game ever made period. 10 years of playing it and still love it.
this was exiting in every way. scary for me to but in a fun good way. I'll never forget playing this with my dad
Est√° bien para media hora, se vuelve muy repetitivo, eso si, si te gusta no parar de disparar y matar zombies sin ton ni son es tu juego. Tiene coop para 4 jugadores.
L4D2' den kat kat daha iyi. Sunucu yok fakat arkada≈ülarƒ±nƒ±zla oynamanƒ±zƒ± √∂neririm.

its nice but not nice as left for dead 2
but still recaminded to buy
Good old times killing zombies and tanks.

This is the REAL Left 4 Dead!
Better Than the sequel.
look this game but maps l4d2 :V

The best game I've ever played. 

I honestly think I have over 1000 hours on my Xbox 360. Currently racking up the hours again on Steam.

Totally worth the purchase. :)

Apesar de eu ter bem poucas horas jogada.. j√° achei o game incr√≠vel, sendo que √© apenas 4 sobreviventes vs milh√µes de zombies, √© bem mais emocionante quando se joga com friends, n√£o que single player seja ruim, mas come√ßa a ficar bem repetitivo, mesmo mapa, mesmo objetivo ( sair aniquilando todos os zombie do mapa e sobreviver ) claro que isso tudo vira um game de piada quando se joga com friends, gritos, zoeiras, cuzagens e tudo que se pode imaginar, *recomendo* mas aconselho que espere uma promo√ß√£o, sempre tem promo que vende os dois game por um pre√ßo abaixo de R$10 comprei o LD 1 e 2 por apenas 6 R$

Polecam ale jeszcze bardziej polecam Left 4 dead 2.

I know it's pretty late to leave a review, but I noticed I hadn't and decided I would lol.
This game is pretty much a huge milstone in gaming history, and will remain just as the Half Life series did.
If you've never played the game, you should buy it. It's actually better than Left 4 Dead 2, which was patched to death a few months after release. If you want great vanilla-game gameplay, love co-op shooters, and a loveable cast of playable characters, this is the game for you.
Great game, but just get the second one since all the content of the first is in that game anyway.
Excelente juego un clasico de Valve. Simplemente todo esta OK.

someone left you 4 dead. in this murder-mystery novel you must find out the secret identitty of the killer and track him down. very exciting but not for the easily disturbed. 

Overall, a solid entry in this long-since established franchise. 4/20

Left 4 Dead jest 4-osobowƒÖ strzelankƒÖ kooperacyjnƒÖ w kt√≥rej naszym g≈Ç√≥wnym celem jest prze≈ºycie, a ≈ºeby prze≈ºyƒá trzeba zabijaƒá, a jak nie zabijasz, to ty jeste≈õ zabijany przez hordy Zombie. 

Zalety: 
- Co-op naprawdƒô wymagajƒÖcy pracy dru≈ºynowej i koordynowania
- Ciekawe dodatkowe tryby gry(Kontra i Przetrwanie) 
- Protagonist√≥w naprawdƒô ≈Çatwo polubiƒá
- Strzelanie jest bardzo mi≈Çe, a zabijanie Zombie daje du≈ºo frajdy 
- Klimatyczny, horrorowy Soundtrack 

Wady: 
- Do≈õƒá ma≈Ço rodzaj√≥w broni
- Grafika nawet na wysokich ustawieniach siƒô mocno zestarza≈Ça
- W grƒô gra bardzo ma≈Ço os√≥b(na rzecz drugiej czƒô≈õci) 

Finalnie, L4D uwa≈ºam za naprawdƒô dobrƒÖ grƒô kooperacyjnƒÖ, lecz polecam bardziej kontynuacjƒô, gdy≈º zawiera ona misjƒô z obydwu czƒô≈õci, wraz z nowymi bro≈Ñmi i dialogami.

The game is a great game for beginners. The campaign is fun and addicting. However though, the multiplayer servers are pretty dead though due to they ported over the left 4 dead one maps to left 4 dead 2. So, if you like this game, you will like the second one. Left 4 Dead 2 is pretty active, HOWEVER, the community is not the greatest.
recomendado para ti es un buen juego como lef4 dead y lef 4 dead 2

This game was amazing back when it was launched. Nothing was really like it. It is simple and fun. RIght now I would not recommend you to buy this since Left 4 Dead 2 is out and contains everything from this game itself. But this is truely an amazing game. I can only put 7 hours into this, but trust me back then I played a hundred hours at least.

Dont buy this one, buy L4D2, this was nothing but an experiment, but amazing nonetheless.

8/10. LOUIS!

This is THE zombie shooter. It's hours upon hours of zombie maiming fun. multiplayer campaigns are my favorite feature, allowing you and up to three friends to sit around a room on your computers yelling at each other about special zombies while you eat doritos and chug soda. This game in a word: fun. A must play for zombie and horror enthusiasts. Just buy it. You won't regret it.
Good Game Nice Work Valve xD

Great game, despite that game is old, it's still one of best run and shoot games.

7/10, you definitely want to buy it.

The ultimate "classic but gold" game. While I do think L4D2 is better because it has more weapons,maps,special infected and it also has the l4d1 maps and survivors, L4D1 just has this unique atmosphere that l4d2 doesn't have in it's own maps or in the l4d1 maps. I just recommend getting the bundle during sales since it's like 4 euro then.
Hell yes, for l4d and l4d2

Highly Recommended!

Among those zombie games, this is the best one I had played. It's so much fun to play with friends, troll your friend or survive with them. Play as a zombie and prevent the survivors to survive the match.

I know I could play the maps of this game through L4D2 but there's just something about the first game that keeps me coming back to it (I played this on the Xbox 360 as well so don't let the low hour count decieve you :D).
